title: Chat restrictions
body: Hey guys,I just wanted to know ,why did I get 75 games with chat restriction.I didn't say nothing wrong to anyone. GL;HF {{champion:55}}

replies.body: "i didnt say anything wrong! If they play bad and feed i tell them they suck, because its the truth and the truth cant be wrong!"
Why do u think, that we know that?
Because things you see as "nothing wrong" are partly wrong, for sure.
